TopicTitle: Mods to get sunglasses on kerbals ect?

Articles.Content: I have seen quite a few youtubers with them, just standard sunglasses, can someone link me to a mod for it?

I have seen quite a few youtubers with them, just standard sunglasses, can someone link me to a mod for it?

You have to be part of the private testing team. It was a reward for them squashing most of the bugs in .16.
